overview: Mr. Hampton is Chief Operating Officer & Chief Financial Officer of FameCast. Prior to joining FameCast, Mr. Hampton was involved in several technology start-up and growth companies including Wayport, Singleentry, NetPliance and Dell Computers. Most recently, Mr. Hampton served on the executive team at Wayport as the CFO for four years and as Vice President for Mergers & Acquisitions for the last two years. Mr. Hampton received both his MBA and BBA from the University of Texas at Austin.
